$HSBC HSBC Bank USA Grants $800,000 to Support Minority, Women and Immigrant-Owned Businesses 

https://newsfilter.io/a/9048b7418fdb43bd54c1ffd4b0ea7c60

links.title: HSBC Bank USA Grants $800,000 to Support Minority, Women and Immigrant-Owned Businesses
links.description: HSBC Bank USA, N.A. , part of HSBC Group, has provided $800,000 in grants to selected Community Development Financial Institutions and nonprofits. The grants will be distributed amongst organizations supporting minority, women and immigrant-owned small businesses - less than $100k in revenue - and will promote economic revitalization and community development in New York, California, Florida and Washington state.

Stocks Close Up as M&A News Brings Back Buyers  $HSBC $CZR $DEO $BA $DOW 

https://newsfilter.io/a/fdfd0c7c4f93436af84606f333c316e0

links.title: Stocks Close Up as M&A News Brings Back Buyers
links.description: Global stocks rose Monday after a rough week, with investors looking past more bad news on the Covid-19 front and focusing instead on mergers and acquisitions activity and positive corporate news. Concerns over the coming U.S. presidential election as well as fears of rising coronavirus cases and an uneven economic recovery had been a weight on stocks in recent weeks.
